Key Match Events: Edwin Uceta allowed an RBI single to Buddy Kennedy
Uceta then allowed a two-run home run to Trea Turner
Bryce Harper doubled in the next at-bat
Nick Castellanos was hit by a pitch
The benches cleared as both teams had some choice words for one another
Uceta received a three-game suspension from MLB for intentionally hitting Castellanos
Post-Match Reflections: The Castellanos hit-by-a-pitch, and the support from his teammates could be a spark as the Phillies head into the final push of the regular season and the postseason.
Itâ€™s safe to say he and the Phillies had the last laugh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies won the next game Wednesday night to sweep the Rays out of Philadelphia
Castellanos got his revenge in his first at-bat, hitting a two-run home run in the first inning after being hit by the pitch the night before.
